H0.text: In which castle is Shakespeare's' Hamlet' set. Kronborg Castle

H1.text: In which castle is Shakespeare's' Hamlet' set. Windsor Castle

H2.text: In which castle is Shakespeare's' Hamlet' set. Edinburgh Castle

H3.text: In which castle is Shakespeare's' Hamlet' set. Elsinore

A4.text: Kronborg serves as the setting of William Shakespeare's tragedy Hamlet.

A5.text: Immortalised as Elsinore in William Shakespeare's play Hamlet, Kronborg is one of the most important Renaissance castles in Northern Europe.
